data.message: hate the spam. I don't want page suggestions. The feed has gotten too small. The page is too busy.

replies.message: Its getting bigger, and you will be sorry you asked.,... the new one is awful
my feed just got scrunched. It's about 1/3 of the page now.

I like the way it was before this change.. Now friends post are to bunched together hard to read... I can't leave a birthday message /card for my friends on fb it only allows me to give a gift which I won't do never have and never will...Why don't you listen to your fb users and quit making un-necessary changes that does not benefit them !
If its not broke dont fix it.
if its not broke dont fix it
well you just wait girl.. oh its get much BIGGER and its ridiculous .. hate it
I do not like the new format. Go back to the one we had. I don't like the narrow area for newsfeed at all.
we need to be able to buy farmland on Farmville with all the money we get for our crops

lol I think they meant to say, "Yay! Look at the larger ad column. We think we're so smart and they won't even notice, we'll just tell them it's fabulous" ;) lol I have gotten to a point where it's just laughable. I can't focus on their changes or the ridiculous spin they put on it or I'll go nuts. I'm here, I'm the 'product', and until my reasons for being here no longer apply, I'll just have to deal with it.

I don't come on much. If I could separate my biz page (http://www.facebook.com/LollyBopBaby )from personal, I wouldn't have a personal page anymore! Is there another COMPARABLE social media page out there?
I'm sure there will be soon, FB is pissing off too many people.
